mapper.sql: id, name, sex, age, height, mobile, isorgansignin,organid,createtime,imgpath, fullfacephotopath, sidefacephotopath, fullbodyphotopath, videointroduction
mapper.select:
select
from students where organid = #{organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (createtime=#{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}) order by createtime

select
from students where organid = #{organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (now() >= #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}) order by createtime

select
from students where organid = #{organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (createtime >= #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}) order by createtime desc

select
from students where organid = #{organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (createtime between #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}) order by createtime

mapper.update:
update students
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organid = #{organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
imgpath = #{imgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isorgansignin = #{isorgansignin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fullfacephotopath = #{fullfacephotopath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sidefacephotopath = #{sidefacephotopath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fullbodyphotopath = #{fullbodyphotopath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
videointroduction = #{videointroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update students set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organid = #{organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, imgpath = #{imgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isorgansignin = #{isorgansignin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, levelofeducation = #{levelofeducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fullfacephotopath = #{fullfacephotopath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sidefacephotopath = #{sidefacephotopath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fullbodyphotopath = #{fullbodyphotopath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, videointroduction = #{videointroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
